sentences.en: "Cut her out of your will," urged his nephew.
sentences.cn: “把她从你的遗嘱中删去，”他的侄子催促道。

sentences.en: He is not my son, but my nephew.
sentences.cn: 他不是我的儿子, 而是我的侄儿.

sentences.en: He pays too much heed these days to my nephew Tom, and Tom is no great thinker.
sentences.cn: 他最近过分重视我侄子汤姆的话了，而汤姆根本不是什么伟大的思想家。

sentences.en: He was startled when his nephew came in.
sentences.cn: 当他侄子走进来时,他吃了一惊.

sentences.en: His nephew, Cliffort Pyncheon was found guilty and sentenced to life imprisonment.
sentences.cn: 他的侄儿克利弗德·品思钦被发现与此案有牵连判处了终生监禁.

sentences.en: I am planning a 25th birthday party for my nephew.
sentences.cn: 我在为侄子筹划他25岁的生日聚会。

sentences.en: In February 1967, she began a dalliance with Robin Douglas - Home, 35, a talented and troubled pianist and the nephew of a former prime minister.
sentences.cn: 1967年2月, 玛格丽特与一位前首相的侄子、才华横溢但天性伤感的钢琴家35岁的罗宾·道格拉斯-霍姆开始了一段情缘.

sentences.en: It was the nephew of Monseigneur.
Last month a shopkeeper's nephew was shot dead.
sentences.cn: 上个月一名店主的侄子被枪杀了。

sentences.en: Let my nephew and Goldthred swagger about their wager as they list.
sentences.cn: 让我外甥和戈德斯雷德去信口开河地打赌,随他们的便吧.

sentences.en: My nephew is a cautious investor.
sentences.cn: 我侄子是个小心谨慎的投资者.

sentences.en: My nephew lives only a stone's throw from my house.
sentences.cn: 我侄子住得离我家很近.

sentences.en: She made her nephew her heir.
sentences.cn: 她立她的侄子为继承人.

sentences.en: The nephew made free with his uncle's money.
sentences.cn: 这侄儿乱花他叔叔的钱.

sentences.en: This year all the apples are all red. My niece and nephew are going out this morning with step-ladders to pick some.
sentences.cn: 今年所有的苹果都红了。我侄女和侄子今天早晨准备带上梯子去摘一些。

trans.tran_en: the son of your brother or sister, or the son of your husband’s or wife’s brother or sister
